publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1077 Irene Oldfather: NHS Ayrshire & Arran Tobacco Summit-That the Parliament congratulates NHS Ayrshire and Arran for hosting a Health Summit on Tobacco on Wednesday 10 March 2004, National No Smoking Day; notes that the event brought together local business organisations and policy makers to discuss how best to implement no-smoking policies in the workplace and to share examples of best practice; further notes that the treatment of smoking-related disease costs the NHS in Scotland an estimated Â£200 million a year, and commends the NHS board for undertaking this important initiative.
